books.title: Eloquent JavaScript: A Modern Introduction to Programming
books.author: Marjin Haverbeke

reviews.content: Good book, but not great for new coders

books.title: JavaScript & JQuery: Interactive Front-End Web Development
books.author: Jon Duckett

reviews.content: It really is the Definitive guide
I disagree with everything in this book
This is the only js book you need

books.title: Learning React: Functional Web Development with React and Redux
books.author: Alex Banks and Eve Porcello

books.title: Ancillary Justice: The Imperial Radch Series
books.author: Ann Leckie

reviews.content: The imperial redach is my favorite sci-fi
A unique and modern fantasy, saying it was inspired by hamlet is a very loose description that undersells the creativity and uniqueness of this story
Who knew a post-apocalyptic fanatsy could forge a new path over well-trodden ground while still packing an emotional punch?

books.title: How Not to Be Wrong: The Power of Mathematical Thinking
books.author: Jordan Ellenburg

reviews.content: Easy to follow, humorously presented . . . This book will help you to avoid the pitfalls that result from not having the right tools.

books.title: The Disappearing Spoon: And Other True Tales of Madness, Love, and the History of the World from the Periodic Table of the Elements
books.author: Sam Kean

reviews.content: Nearly 150 years of wide-ranging science...and Kean makes it all interesting. Entertaining and enlightening.

books.title: Dungeons & Dragons Monster Manual (Core Rulebook, D&D Roleplaying Game)
books.author: Wizards RPG Team
